creator: xinxinayu@yahoo.com
text:
I got problem in using parameterizing when using Tomcat 5.5.9, 
It cannot read sign '<' and '>' in my JSP file.

creator: yoavs@computer.org
text:
Please use the tomcat-user mailing list to assist you in debugging.  Bugzilla
should be used only for reporting reproducible bugs (I use < and > in my JSPs
all the time on Tomcat 5.5.9 without a problem).  If after a mailing list
discussion it turns out you've uncovered a Tomcat bug, feel free to open a
Bugzilla issue for it, and provide all the steps needed to reproduce your
problem, including in this case the exact JSP or WAR containing the JSP.
